entry.title: Hello！
entry.content: Hello!Welcome to my blog!坐标(Location)： 广州(Guangzhou)职业(Job)： 大学生(College student)博客简介(Blog introduction) ：记录日常~~~ (Record daily work and life happened) 123456789101112#include <iostream>using namespace std;int main(){ cout << "Hello! Welcome to my blog!" << endl; cout << "坐标(Location)： 广州(Guangzhou)" << endl; cout << "职业(Job)： 大学生(College student)" << endl; cout << "博客简介(Blog introduction) ：" << endl; cout << "记录日常~~~ (Record daily work and life happened)"; return 0;}
